JAELBI Music Video Contest!!! 18 - 25 MAY 2007 !!!

JALEBI Music Video Contest 18 – 25 May 2007

PARTICIPATE…..and BECOME A LUCKY WINNER!

10 LUCKY WINNERS WIN A JALEBI Music Digital CD!!!

What's the deal? It's very simple! The first 10 JALEBI Music Fans who answer the following question correctly will win a JALEBI Music Digital CD:

for our first JALEBI Music Video?

The JALEBI Music Video Contest starts midnight FRIDAY, 18 May 2007 and ends midnight FRIDAY 25 May 2007!

For complete details please go to www.betarecords.com/jalebi and click on the BLOG entry “JALEBI Music Video Contest 18 - 25 May 2007! Thank you!

Looking forward to hearing from you all in MASSIVE numbers!

PARTICPATE....and BECOME A LUCKY WINNER!!!

Thank you ALL for your continued support!

Hare Krsna! Namaste, baby! : )
JALEBI

JALEBI Music Global Video Release

JALEBI Music Global Video Release

JALEBI Music announces the worldwide release of its first JALEBI Music Video “Jaya Radhe (The Girl Has Got It All)” This video has already become famous due to a global publicity campaign organized by JALEBI Music that involved fans trying to guess exactly which of the eight songs on the JALEBI Music debut CD would be chosen for the group’s first video! JALEBI Fans from 134 countries were given the opportunity to win a JALEBI Music digital CD if they guessed correctly the title of the JALEBI Music song chosen for the video!

JALEBI Music wishes to take this opportunity to congratulate the winners whose names have been posted on the official JALEBI Music web site at www.jalebimusic.com in the NEWS section and to sincerely thank all of the participants for becoming involved and for supporting …as always….JALEBI Music’s efforts to promote, peace, transcendental love and harmony around the world.

Since our JALEBI Music Video “Jaya Radhe (The Girl Has Got It All) has been launched globally it is NOW ONLINE and available on various web sites for your transcendental listening and viewing pleasure!

Here is a partial list of where you can find and get our JALEBI Music video “Jaya Radhe (The Girl Has Got It All):

http://www.jalebimusic.com/press-group-94.html

http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=-2641088136525019539

www.soundclick.com/jalebimusic

www.myspace.com/jalebimusic

www.youtube.com/JALEBIMusic

www.myspace.com/jalebi_music

http://krishnafriends.com/profile.php?id=437

www.tagged.com/jalebimusic.com

www.hikut.com/jalebi

http://www.jalebimusic.podshow.com/

We would like to encourage all of our JALEBI Music Fans Around the World to not only look and listen to our video but to also post it on their web sites, web pages and blogs! Share it with your family, friends and colleagues...and the World! Pass the word! You will not only receive our heart-felt thanks but even more important.....you will receive the sweet blessings of Srimate Radharani, Herself! Jaya Radhe! Jaya Sri Krishna!

Hare Krsna! Namaste!
JALEBI
-Shirley Marie Bradby (MiraBai Devi Dasi)
-Ramandanda Roy
-Yasodananda

(Please scroll down to the bottom of the Chart page to see our wonderful results in the WORLD classification!)

This means that we have been NJMBER ONE for 38 WEEKS! Incredible but true! Plus we have never held less than 5 positions on the Top Eight World Chart! All of this can be attributed to the loyalty and enthusiasm of our JALEBI Music Fans Around the World!

Our goal is to REMAIN NUMBER ONE for 52 WEEKS = ONE YEAR! Can we do it? Yes, if everyone continues to vote! Remember that you do not have to listen to the complete song for it to count as a vote! Just listen for 30 -40 seconds and it is counted as a vote! Remember: You can vote only once during a 24 hour period! Please vote for ALL our songs so that we can also maintain all of our Top Eight Positions on the World Chart!

JALEBI Flash: NATURAL MYSTIC FESTIVAL ...A Happening!!!

Message from the transcendental front lines!
Lago di Vico (Ronciglione, Viterbo - ITALY)

Our first concert at the NATURAL MYSTIC FESTIVAL held at Lago di Vico , Ronciglione (Viterbo) Italy….. on 12 August 2007 was a resounding success!!! People were dancing and singing like crazy! Men , women and children!

As for those who were still sitting?!?! It was because they COULDN'T get up!!! : ) Lame, sick or physically incapacitated in some way! EVERYBODY else was on the floor boogieing to JALEBI Music!! : )

Such transcendental energy! Che bello! (Beautiful!) We have been asked by popular demand to also participate today on 26 August 2007......in the second NATURAL MYSTIC FESTIVAL concert ! We wouldn't miss it for the world! : ) And neither should you! : D

We will post pictures in the near future on our web site!
Got to run! Say a big "Hare Krsna" for us! Thank you.....and stay tuned!

Hey...it's time to JALEBI!!!
Hare Krsna! Namaste, baby! ; )
JALEBI
- Shirley Marie Bradby (MiraBai Devi Dasi)
- Ramananda Roy
- Yasodananda das

JALEBI Music: Janmashtami Festival 4 Sept 2007 (Italy)

JANMASHTAMI FESTIVAL

The advent of Lord Krishna is celebrated by devotees around the world with pomp and circumstance, a festival called Janmashtami.
In the Bhagavad-gita, Lord Krishna states: "Whenever and wherever there is a decline in religious principles, and a predominant rise of irreligion, at that time I descend Myself." (Bhagavad-gita, Chapter 4, Text 7)

5,000 years ago demonic kings ruled the Earth and exploited her resources. At that time the Supreme Personality of Godhead, Sri Krishna, appeared in the land of Vrindavan. He performed godly feats, destroyed demons, lifted Govardhana Hill, and expanded Himself into hundreds of cowherd boys and calves to humble Lord Brahma. At the climax of His advent, documented in the epic Mahabharata as the battle of Kurushetra, Lord Krishna spoke the Bhagavad-gita to instruct mankind. Shortly thereafter He returned to His eternal abode, Goloka Vrindavan, in the spiritual sky.

How Janmashtami is Celebrated
On Janmashtami, devotees rise early and spend the day absorbed in prayer and meditation, fasting until midnight (except for water.) At temples, the Deities of Lord Krishna and His companion Srimati Radharani are bathed with auspicious ingredients including milk, honey, yogurt, and fruit juices.

Artists perform dances, dramas and musicals glorifying the advent of Lord Krishna.

Some devotees dress the Deities elaborately with outfits made entirely of flowers, while others prepare 108 dishes of delicious foods for the Lord.

At midnight, the time when Lord Krishna appeared, conchshells, drums and cymbals sound tumultuously. The altar curtains open to reveal the Deities of Their Lordships, Sri Sri Radha-Krishna, beautifully dressed in flower outfits, surrounded by 108 preparations of delicous foods. The crowd erupts in joyful celebration with a midnight arati ceremony, singing sacred hymns, chanting, dancing, and concluding with a feast to break the fast.

Janmashtami is the largest and most important festival for devotees of Krishna. It is a good time to visit your nearest Hare Krishna temple to get a glimpse into the opulent Krishna culture and tradition. You'll experience colorful dances, theatrical performances, melodious music, sweet smelling incense and fragrant flowers, interact with many spiritually minded people, and partake in a delicious vegetarian feast prepared with love and devotion. Check our listing of www.krishna.com/main.php?id=31” 500+Hare Krsna centers for the one nearest you.

To see the original article http://www.krishna.com/main.php?id=425” The Hare Krishna Movement Holy Days click here

For more information about Janmastami please see http://www.krishna.com/main.php?id=687 "The Significance of Janmastami" from "Delving Deeper" with Carl E. Woodham.

Let's all give Sri Krsna a nice Janmashtami present.....by keeping "Radha Govinda Kirtan" NUMBER ONE! : D Please remember that our goal is 52 WEEKS! http://www.betarecords.com/jalebi Vote today! Thank you! : )

Happy Janmashtami! : )

JALEBI
- Shirley Marie Bradby (MiraBai Devi Dasi)
- Ramananda Roy
- Yasodananda

JALEBI Music: 2007 Ratha Yatra Festival (Viareggio, Italy)

2007 RATHA YATRA Festival Viareggio, Italy

Namaste! Hare Krsna! ; )
Hello, JALEBI Fans and friends around the world! : )

Let me tell you that 2007 RATHA YATRA FESTIVAL held on 14 August 2007 in Viareggio, Italy is one concert that we will remember and treasure in our hearts for years to come! But first, of all we would like to praise and thank all the devotees who organized this year's festival and everyone who participated: devotees of Krsna who came from all over the world (!), friends, family and general members of the public! Everyone was so enthusiastic and happy!

The festival is now over but if you would like to get a good idea of what happened and feel the transcendental vibrations that were electifying the air..... then please just click href="http://www.isvara.org/images/rathayatra2007viareggio/">here</a>; to see a very nice photo service by Isvaradas!!!

We will be posting our own photos of JALEBI in concert at the 2007 Ratha Yatra Festival in Viareggio soon in our http://www.jalebimusic.com/photos.html JALEBI Music PHOTO GALLERY! So plese drop by and check it out!

SPECIAL THANKS:
A very special thanks is due to Bhaktin Valentina Fabrizi who offered a great service to JALEBI Music by providing transportation, general assistance and making sure that yours truly (MiraBai!!!) arrived at the festival on time... and in good condition! : ) A true blessing! Thank you Bhaktin Valentina! : )

A very special mention and thanks is also due to Bhakta DJ Antonio who provided us with some special beats and sound effects during our concert! Grazie mille! Thank you, Bhakta Antonio !!! Hare Krsna! : )

JALEBI
- Shirley Marie Bradby (MiraBai Devi Dasi)
- Ramananda Roy
- Yasodananda

JALEBI Music 48 WEEKS Number ONE!!!

CD Baby Band JALEBI Music’s song ”Radha Govinda Kirtan” has held the NUMBER ONE spot on the BETA Records Top Eight World Chart for 48 weeks! Since 24 October 2006 to 27 September 2007...…and counting! Only Four more weeks= 52 Weeks = ONE YEAR!

Thanks to Sri Krsna (smile)...and marketing tips and suggestions offered by Derek Sivers(CD Baby founder) JALEBI Music has managed to attract and maintain a fan base in 134 countries that has awarded them by keeping JALEBI Music NUMBER ONE on the BETA Records Top Eight World Chart for 48 weeks!

JALEBI Music has also in the past months aced ALL of the Top Eight Positions on the BETA Records World Chart World Chart…..once for six consecutive weeks! Click here to see the World Chart
http:// www.betarecords.com/charts.php (Please scroll down to the bottom of the Chart page!)

A huge thank you goes out to CD Baby....and to all of our JALEBI Music fans in 134 countries! Keep on voting at http://www.betarecords.com/jalebi

All you have to do is just click on a song and it is an automatic vote. Please remember...you can vote only once in a 24 hour period! Ok? Ok!

Help us make BETA Records history! 52 WEEKS = One YEAR in the Number ONE spot! With your help we can do it! Let’s make history …together! : D

Thanks a million!

Hare Krsna! Namaste, baby! : )
JALEBI

This JALEBI Music conscious art song "Phenomenon" invites everyone to chant and sing the Maha Mantra, to connect with God in a joyous and loving way! Sri Caitanya Mahaprabhu Ki Jaya! Hare Krsna! Hariiiiiiiiiiiiiibol! : )
